original_title: Trivium - Live at Summer Breeze Festival 2018
overview: Live at Summer Breeze Festival on August 17, 2018  at Flugplatz des Aeroclubs Dinkelsbühl, Dinkelsbühl, Germany  Tour: The Sin and the Sentence Tour  HDTV Broadcast  Setlist:  Run to the Hills (Iron Maiden song)  The Sin and the Sentence  Throes of Perdition  Betrayer  Sever the Hand  Inception of the End  Until the World Goes Cold  Down From the Sky  Like Light to the Flies  Shattering the Skies Above  The Heart From Your Hate  Beyond Oblivion  Encore:  Strife  Capsizing The Sea  In Waves
title: Trivium - Live at Summer Breeze Festival 2018
